text: You are in the kitchen. The fridge is closed. There is an apple on the counter next to a knife.
Open the fridge first before placing any item inside. The fridge has a shelf for produce.
The living room contains a sofa and a TV. A remote lies on the table.
To put the apple into the fridge: pick up the apple, open the fridge door, place the apple on the top shelf.
Microwave usage: never put metallic objects inside. Use 1 minute to reheat leftovers.
After placing items in the fridge, close the door to keep temperature stable.
Bedroom notes: closet is on the left, window on the right.
If the fridge door is stuck, pull the handle firmly. Do not force beyond normal resistance.
